text:
Tâche 2:
To start with, knowing what you want to do with your life is not something you may call easy. "What do you want to become" remains a question that people ask you a lot. When you are little, you answer something like an adventurer or a princess or a traveller. Every aswers are approriate given that you are child and therefore you are allowed to dream. Obviously, people keep asking you this question, and it comes a time when this question become serious, you have to know precisely what you want to do and who you want to be. It quite hard to know actually, except for people who have always knew the right answer to that question. As far as I'm concerned, I still don't know the right answer to that question. So as to be honest, i don't even know why I am here, I guess since I was good in high school, it made sense to go to College, even though I didn't want to. However, there I am, and to be really honest I like it there, and in any case I had to find something to study about, indeed, I had to find the perfect plan B. Furthermore, I am here because my plan B is to become a journalist. Well, i really wish to be an adventurer et thanks to that job i will be able to share my adventures. I have this plan B in mind since I am 14 and thanks to my history teacher from that time. He was the best history teacher and one Day, he made us do an exercise in which we had to become a journalist and we had to tell about a country in which we had made an invented road trip. I remember how much I liked to write about a road trip, it was so fun and in addition, i have always been dreaming about travelling, seeing other landscapes, finding out about new cultures... Moreover, as I have the chance to live in an aera in which sharing something thanks to internet is as simple as getting dressed, I want to become a Hugo décrypte 2.0. Indeed, I would like to create a youtube channel and, given that I want to be more of a reporter who goes out and who explores the world with its beaty as well as its problems than "just" a journalist, I could post videos about my report, my trips, or things that I learn in a country or just flash news, I could talk about anything and live every experiences and adventures that I hav always dreamt of. Nevertheless, this remain my plan B since my plan A is to become the greatest actress and diva of the 21 century, but for that I have to get my own back and to prepare every plan until plan Z incase nobody notice my talent. Anyway, that is what I want to become, an actress, an explorer, a diva, a journalist, a reporter, a teacher, because I want to live several lives in one.
